ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Functions to export graphics drawn with package grid to SVG format.  Additional functions provide access to SVG features that are not available in standard R graphics, such as hyperlinks, animation, filters, masks, clipping paths, and gradient and pattern fills.

Functions to export graphics drawn with package grid to SVG format.  Additional functions provide access to SVG features that are not available in standard R graphics, such as hyperlinks, animation, filters, masks, clipping paths, and gradient and pattern fills.

name: r-gridsvg
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.7-7" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-gridsvg
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/gridSVG_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/gridSVG/gridSVG_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 844b19bdbda0166d752f8c4f6cdf5a0533b161486447305cf94ffcab62dd457a

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-xml
    - r-jsonlite
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-xml
    - r-jsonlite

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('gridSVG')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('gridSVG')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=gridSVG
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Functions to export graphics drawn with package grid to SVG format.  Additional functions provide access to SVG features that are not available in standard R graphics, such as hyperlinks, animation, filters, masks, clipping paths, and gradient and pattern fills.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: gridSVG
# Title: Export 'grid' Graphics as SVG
# Version: 1.7-1
# Authors@R: c(person("Paul", "Murrell", role = c("cre", "aut"), email = "paul@stat.auckland.ac.nz"), person("Simon", "Potter", role = "aut", email = "simon@sjp.co.nz"))
# Description: Functions to export graphics drawn with package grid to SVG format.  Additional functions provide access to SVG features that are not available in standard R graphics, such as hyperlinks, animation, filters, masks, clipping paths, and gradient and pattern fills.
# Imports: grDevices, graphics, utils, methods, grid, jsonlite, XML
# Suggests: lattice
# License: GPL
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-10-23 19:10:09 UTC; pmur002
# Author: Paul Murrell [cre, aut], Simon Potter [aut]
# Maintainer: Paul Murrell <paul@stat.auckland.ac.nz>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-10-28 21:30:02 UTC
